Letters

"Unfortunately Mother Nature was not a beer fan"

Living, as we do in a county of acres of farmland and parkland, it is unsurprising that the local programming can often be described as mundane but more frequently down right boring.

"We were tourists, little more than unskilled migrant labourers with altitude sickness"

NUS Discount, Anyone?

For most of us, apart from the discounts, saving those vital pounds, the value and relevance of NUS membership is minute.

Not everywhere can be Soho or Brighton but no gay bars at all?!

"This isn't advocay of press censorship, but it is a call for sensible discretion"
